symbol.description: OPTIONS is an object which can be empty or can have any of these optional flags:    hierarchy => 1, // include a hierarchical tree structure in the results (default: 1)    selectors => 1, // include a report of values selectors in the results (default: 1)    contracts => 1, // include a flat list in the results (default: 0)    FIELD1    => VALUE1, // filter results to just those where FIELD1 equals VALUE1    FEILD2    => VALUE2, ...
